EmailTemplate.name: Patricks Test Problem Title
EmailTemplate.subject: Subject: Title Problem Identified: {!Case.Vehicle_Year_Make_Model__c}, {!Case.VIN__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Our office has identified a problem(s) with the title paperwork for {!Case.Vehicle_Year_Make_Model__c} {!Case.VIN__c}, sold on {!Case.Auction_End__c}. The problem(s) is as follows:
{!Case.Title_Problem_Subset__c}; {!Case.Details__c}
Please reach out to your ACV Specialist, {!Case.OwnerFullName}, at {!Case.OwnerEmail} with any questions.
Thank you,
Titles Team ACV Auctions 716-796-6976
